== Amadalli (602627) ==
      
Amadalli is a village in the [[Karwar ]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 2323.43 hectares and harbouring 1799 households with total population of 7158 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[KARWAR]] is at a distance of 15 km. Male population is 3503 and female population is 3655. Scheduled Caste Population is 278 and Scheduled Tribes population is 5. Census Location Code of the village is 602627<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Literate female population: 2456 (67.2%)
